roleset.name: bring back to body
roleset.note: REINCARNATE-V NOTES: Frame created by Jena. (from reincarnate.01-v)

example.text: He-1 is reincarnated *-1 soon after in the body of a baby boy.
example.arg: in the body of a baby boy

example.text: The evil master of the universe reincarnated John into a rooster.
example.arg: The evil master of the universe
